subject: Miri nazar mein khaak, tere aine pe gard hai
text:
Miri nazar mein khaak, tere aine pe gard hai
Yeh chand kitna zard hai, yeh raat kitni sard

Kabhi kabhi to yun laga ke ham sabhi masheen hein
Tamaam shehr mein na koi zan na koi mard hai

Khuda ki nazmon ki kitaab saari kaaynat hai
Ghazal key sher ki tarah har eik fard fard hai

Hayaat aaj bhi kaneez hai huzure jabr mein
10 zindagi ko jeet Ie wo zindagi ka mard hai

Use tabarruqe hayat kahke palkon par rakhun
Agar mujhe yaqeen ho ye raste ki gard hai

Wo jinke zikr se ragon mein daudti thin bijliyan
Unhi ka haath ham ne chhooke dekha kitna sard hai
